page.title: 11May Day at Walbottle.
page.content: than 200 children attended the evening disco.Mrs Ruth Robson,secretary of the festiival committee said,"It went very well.The weather held up wth just one or two showers in the evening,which weren't enough to spoil it".The festival was opened by the Lord Mayor of Newcastle,Councillor Roy Burgess and his wife,Audry,the Lady Mayoress. MAY DAY In nearby Walbottle,the children of the first school celebrate the beginning of May with a Maypole dance. This has taken place since 1980,and the dance takes place on the Village green.One of the children from the school is chosen and crowned as the May Queen. The village also holds an annual fete,followed by a barn dance in the evening.
